channel.title: Spec bar only yellow text?

item.title: Spec bar only yellow text?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Point taken. Take all the colours out then just add the colour you want see if that works, but I guess you are smarter then me and you’ve already tried if not have fun. This isn’t a flame I’m half a sleep and going to BED G’night

Read full topic

item.title: Spec bar only yellow text?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

What about this?

@gre@S P E C I A L@bla@ A T T A C K

Read full topic

item.title: Spec bar only yellow text?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Maybe because of this?

@yel@S P E C I A L A T T A C K"

Read full topic

item.description:
